评论详情: I ordered the Light Blue version of this dress. In the photo you see the flowers flow down from the top and up from the bottom with shadow looking flowers in the center. That's not what you get. There is a section at the top with flowers and a section at the bottom with flowers and pure white in the middle. It looked very weird. The white liner you see peeking from under the dress in the photo was at least 4" longer than the actual dress and made me feel like my slip was showing and I needed to shorten it. The dress and jacket fit but I doubt the fabric would last more than one or two wearings unless you're very careful with it. I returned this dress.

评论概述: beautiful design - neck line sits weird
评论详情: Beautiful design - love the white linen look and the flowing organza over jacket.  It has a tie in the back to pull in the waist if you want to.  The odd part is the neck line.  No matter what I did, iron, tie, or untie, the neck line is wrinkled and looks weird.  The cut of the dress was not right for my body.  My shoulders needed to be wider or my bust smaller, not quite sure what was going on there.  It wasn't tight, just a permanent wrinkle across the chest.  If I would have tried it on in a store I would not have purchased it.  It's very pretty and I wore it to a wedding, but I don't think I'll wear it again.

I loved the look of this dress in the picture, but it’s not half as pretty in person.  It has a weird drawstring waist that really didn’t cinch up much, and the thick ties show under the sheer cover.  Although I went by the measurement chart, the bust and waist were too big. It dragged the floor and would be a nightmare to hem.  Back to Amazon.:(
